item.title: 几个月来，对中国奢侈品行业增长放缓的担忧一直困扰着整个行业，但古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）耗资 90 亿美元的破产又让人们担心，这种不景气正在蔓延。
item.description:
Fears of a slowdown in China's luxury goods have dogged the industry for months, but a $9 billion meltdown at Gucci owner Kering is raising concern that the slump is spreading. https://t.co/6aNgLD1X98

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 24, 2024

item.title: 🇪🇬 在短短几周内，埃及摆脱了数十年来最严重的货币危机，成为新兴市场中最热门的行业。那么，下一步是什么？

So, what's next? https://t.co/VmTM3PjbrU

item.title: 尽管财政和货币当局正在制定新的货币改革计划，津巴布韦仍计划保留今年每个交易日都在贬值的本币。

item.title: 乔-拜登总统签署了一项1.2万亿美元的拨款方案，使美国政府得以继续运行至9月30日，避免了政府部分停摆的局面
item.description:

item.title: 国内对棉花的需求正在持续下降。在 2023 年最后五个月关闭了八家纺织厂后，美国只剩下约 100 家纺织厂
item.description:
Domestic demand for cotton is on an unrelenting decline. After eight mills closed in the last five months of 2023, only around 100 are left in the US https://t.co/QT7qspQdXq

item.title: 美国大约 6000 台老式比特币挖矿机不久将被闲置，并被送往科罗拉多斯普林斯的一个仓库，在那里它们将被重新刷新，并转售给希望在低成本环境中挖矿获利的海外买家。
item.description:
About 6,000 older Bitcoin mining machines in the US will soon be idled and sent to a warehouse in Colorado Springs where they’ll be refreshed and resold to buyers overseas looking to profit from mining in lower-cost environs https://t.co/hSOnAGCVlv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: Chipotle 历史性的股票分拆方案凸显了今年牛市的巨大魅力，显示了这家快餐连锁店必须付出巨大努力，才能让那些喜欢其平价卷饼的人买得起其股票。
item.description:
Chipotle's historic stock-split proposal spotlights the enormity of this year’s bull run by showing the lengths the fast-food chain must go to bring its shares within reach of those who enjoy its affordable burritos https://t.co/OyHSXyh1ZI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024
